introduction.title: Introduction
content: At Huntier, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered HR platform.
By using our service, you consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
items: Name, email address, and phone number
Profile photos and other uploaded content

aiGeneratedData.title: AI-Generated Data
items: Mock interview responses and performance analytics
Job matching recommendations and compatibility scores
Career guidance and skill assessment results

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
purposes: Provide and maintain our job search and recruitment services
Deliver AI-powered resume optimization and interview preparation
Match you with relevant job opportunities
Communicate with you about our services and updates
Improve our AI algorithms and platform functionality
Ensure security and prevent fraudulent activity
Comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms

aiProcessing.title: AI and Machine Learning Processing
aiProcessing.intro: Our AI services process your data to provide personalized recommendations:

services.name: Resume Analysis:
services.description: We analyze your resume content to suggest improvements and optimize formatting

services.name: Interview Simulation:
services.description: We process your responses to provide feedback and improvement suggestions

services.name: Job Matching:
services.description: We use your profile data to recommend relevant job opportunities

services.name: Skill Assessment:
services.description: We evaluate your skills and experience to provide career guidance

aiProcessing.disclaimer: All AI processing is designed to benefit you directly and improve your job search experience. We do not use your data to train general AI models without your explicit consent.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

circumstances.description: When you authorize us to share information with potential employers
With trusted third-party services that help us operate our platform
When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales
We may share aggregated, non-personally identifiable information for research purposes

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
measures: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Secure cloud infrastructure with trusted providers
Employee training on data protection and privacy

yourRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

rights.description: Request copies of your personal data
Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
Request deletion of your personal data (subject to certain exceptions)
Request transfer of your data in a structured, machine-readable format
Object to certain types of processing
Request restriction of processing under certain circumstances

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
purposes: Analyze site traffic and usage patterns
cookies.control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling certain cookies may limit some functionality of our service.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: As a global platform, we may transfer your information to countries outside your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during international transfers, including standard contractual clauses and adequacy decisions where applicable.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information within 30 days, except where retention is required by law.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact us:
